law.history: Repealed 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 2. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 8. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 1. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 1. -- -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2711a-186.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Daily pay for active state service.
